name: DocMD
description:
For the Godot Wild Jam #30, link here.

A mix-up of fast-food service games like Cook Serve Delicious and the Trauma Center series for Nintendo DS and Wii published by ATLUS. You run a quack for-profit hospital and must make enough money by the end of 7 days to repay your student loan, or risk losing everything! Treat patients to earn money, and use that money end at the end of each day to buy new tools and unlock new surgical procedures.

NOTE: Reading the help menu is highly recommended before playing. In-game the help menu can be opened at any time during the work day by clicking the "?" book in the upper-left hand corner of the screen

NOTE: Make sure that you are selecting the correct tool in multi-part procedures. Using the wrong tool on the wrong minigame will damage the patient!

Code and Art assets by AceDegenerate and DefectiveMelon

Audio either made with bfxr or from freesound.org
